meanings.definition: To honor the memory of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: We commemorated our grandfather by placing flowers on his grave.
meanings.sent2: Every year, we commemorated Memorial Day by visiting the war memorial.
meanings.sent3: The family commemorated their pet goldfish with a tiny fish-shaped gravestone.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to charity work was commemorated by a special award ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The town commemorated the fallen soldiers with a solemn parade.

meanings.definition: To celebrate or observe an event or person by some ceremony or action.
meanings.sent1: The school commemorated the end of the year with a talent show.
meanings.sent2: They commemorated their wedding anniversary with a romantic dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat commemorated its birthday by sleeping all day in a sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The team commemorated their victory with a celebratory dance.
meanings.sent5: The community commemorated the historical event with a reenactment.
